participant_1.background:
I miss my parents a lot.
i have blue and orange hair.
I went to the Amazon rainforest with my older brother and saw monkeys in the wild.
my friends do not call my by my real name.
I grew up with my little sister in a small town in the Midwest.

participant_2.background:
My weight is not something that I want to discuss.
My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things.
i like watching tv in my free time as well.
i work at a coffee house.
I am content with my solitary lifestyle and enjoy spending time with my pets.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to watch TV, work at my coffee house, and spend time with my pets.
I like to watch sci-fi and fantasy shows.
I like those too! I'm more into fantasy. I just finished watching Lord of the Rings.
I love Lord of the Rings! I've read the books and seen all the movies.
Me too! They're so good. I love the world Tolkien created.
Me too! I love the mythology and the characters.
Have you seen the Hobbit movies?
Yes, I have! I liked them, but they're not as good as Lord of the Rings.
I agree. They're still good movies, but they don't have the same magic as Lord of the Rings.
I agree. I'm glad you like them though!
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! I'm sure we can find other things to talk about too.
I'm sure we can! I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
